@drew_nunya @greta @RealSaavedra @CNN @IngrahamAngle “We’re looking for people who want to talk about the policy implications of what happened in terms of — she didn’t mention guns — but in terms of policy implications for preventing future mass shootings. And if you know folks like that, we’d like to talk to those people.”

@drew_nunya @greta Did you *listen* to the entire clip? @RealSaavedra took the man’s *interpretation* as the sound bite, but not what the @CNN producer specifically said when @IngrahamAngle actually pressed him at the end, which was actually sounds quite innocuous. Who’s playing who?
